block.p: ZIMMERMAN-Estelle. The entire Beth Israel Medical Center family joins with the physicians and staff of the Milton and Bernice Stern Department of Pediatrics in acknowledging with sadness the passing of Estelle Zimmerman, beloved wife of our late colleague and friend, Morris Zimmerman, M.D., a member of the pediatrics staff for close to 60 years. To the entire Zimmerman family, we extend our heartfelt condolences. Matthew E. Fink, M.D. President and CEO Henry Singman, M.D. President, Medical Board Andrew P. Mezey, M.D. Chairman of Pediatrics Robert L. Salant, M.D. President, Doctors Alumni Assn.

ZIMMERMAN-Estelle. The entire Beth Israel Medical Center family joins with the physicians and staff of the Milton and Bernice Stern Department of Pediatrics in acknowledging with sadness the passing of Estelle Zimmerman, beloved wife of our late colleague and friend, Morris Zimmerman, M.D., a member of the pediatrics staff for close to 60 years. To the entire Zimmerman family, we extend our heartfelt condolences. Matthew E. Fink, M.D. President and CEO Henry Singman, M.D. President, Medical Board Andrew P. Mezey, M.D. Chairman of Pediatrics Robert L. Salant, M.D. President, Doctors Alumni Assn.
